titleInfo.title: An Index to the Lankavatara Sutra (Nanjio Edition): Sanskrit-Chinese-Tibetan, Chinese-Sanskrit and Tibetan-Sanskrit, with a Tabulated List of Parallel Pages of the Nanjio Sanskrit Texts and the Three Chinese, Translations (Sung, Wei, and T'ang) in the Taisho Edition of the Tripitaka
